name: ext-cli-ux
description: CLI UX primitives: deterministic progress, tables, and JSONL output (pinned via arch/cli).
docs:
CLI UX primitives: deterministic progress, tables, and JSONL output (pinned via arch/cli).

Modules:
- std.cli.profile
- std.cli.progress
- std.cli.table
- std.cli.jsonl
- std.cli.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-cli-ux@0.1.2
- Load profile from arch: std.cli.profile.from_arch_v1
- Render progress: std.cli.progress.render_v1
- Render tables: std.cli.table.render_v1
- Emit JSONL: std.cli.jsonl.encode_v1
